block.p: SCHUMAN--Sol, age 86. Peacefully in Rockville, MD, on Tuesday, April 3, 2007. Sol Schuman, formerly of New York and Pembroke Pines, FL. Husband of 54 years to Shirley (Moshinsky) Schuman. Father of Maxine (Stephen) Labovsky of San Francisco, CA, and Roberta (Fred) Kline of N. Potomac, MD. Brother of William (Thelma) Schuman and Joseph (Ruth) Schuman. Grandfather of Neila and Daniel Kline. Also survived by many nieces and nephews. Graveside funeral services will be held on April 5, 2007, 1 PM at Garden of Remembrance Cemetery, Clarksburg, MD. Services by Torchinsky Hebrew Funeral Home, Washington, DC. 1-800-500-5401.
